sub_title: Manager Safety Testing & Modeling at Nouryon

profile_positions.description:
Leading Lean Six Sigma Improvement projects at various operations within a specialty chemicals business. Supporting implementation of Lean Six Sigma and continuous improvement training programs. Providing support to various disciplines with know-how on project management, Lean Six Sigma and continuous improvement techniques. Ensuring engagement of stakeholders within the organization.
Certified as Master Black Belt in February 2019
profile_positions.title: Lean Six Sigma Black Belt Project Manager

profile_positions.description: Managing and leading safety, compliance and efficiency programs within a large (>200 FTE) R&D facility. Ensuring compliance with relevant regulatory framework. Ensuring alignment with various stakeholders. Leading safety improvement programs and -initiatives. Initiating and leading cost-efficiency initiatives. Leading development of an occupational hygiene risk management framework for large scale chemical laboratories. Driving cultural change throughout the organization. Leading the optimization of safety management systems. Developing a framework for optimization of the internal services organization.
profile_positions.title: Director Safety and Operations RDI Deventer

profile_positions.description: Leading the development of an innovative Chemical Vapor Deposition technology platform for large scale corrosion protection applications. Managing experimental activities within a laboratory environment. Managing the design and development of lab- and pilot scale CVD equipment. Managing the setup of large scale CVD pilot facilities in Germany. Managing business development activities, including commercial and technical partnerships with large third parties in steel and automotive OEM industries. Managing safety, environmental and compliance aspects of scaling up processes. Leading a team of subject matter experts.
profile_positions.title: Project Leader / Business Development CVD Technology

profile_positions.description: Leading the development of new business initiatives and innovation within the specialty chemicals portfolio. Managing R&D programs including allocation of resources and implementation of development programs. Managing interaction between regional and global activities. Managing interaction with third parties within and outside of the chemical industry. Leading research activities based on innovative technologies, including the setup of a laboratory infrastructure for CVD technology.
profile_positions.title: Ventures Manager

profile_positions.description: Managing and leading a large (75 FTE) team of highly skilled Health, Safety and Environmental experts, providing services in diverse HSE areas including chemical product and process safety, regulatory toxicology, environmental affairs, eco-efficiency & sustainability and product regulatory aspects. Managing 2 dedicated laboratories with activities in chemical product and process safety, ecotoxicology and environmental aspects of chemical substances. Managing GLP-endorsed environmental testing activities. Managing 9 teams with global presence in China, Germany, Sweden, The Netherlands and USA. Ensuring alignment of services with customer base. Driving cultural change and optimizing services & geo-footprint within a multicultural setting. Managing internal and external key accounts.
profile_positions.title: Manager Safety, Health, Environmental & Regulatory Affairs

profile_positions.description: Managing a highly specialized chemical safety laboratory including a team of 20 experts. Developing the business plan for commercialization of the services portfolio. Driving transformation and cultural change from a cost into a profit center-based operation. Managing commercialization initiatives, including business & services development, portfolio optimization, promotion activities and partnerships. Managing internal and external key accounts. Ensuring the maintenance of quality, safety and commercial standards. Managing and optimizing interaction with internal and external stakeholders.
profile_positions.title: Business Manager Safety Services

profile_positions.description: Managing a specialized portfolio of highly reactive chemical products, including full P&L and commercial responsibility. Overseeing regional manufacturing operations, R&D and technical services. Managing commercial activities in the European, Middle East and Indian regions, including key account management of main parties within the polymer and related industries. Managing and optimizing the products and services portfolio. Ensuring compliance to regulatory and safety standards.  Driving optimization of production activities at the regional manufacturing base. Managing European sales force and sales offices in UK and Spain. Managing interaction with distributors and commercial agents.
profile_positions.title: Business Manager Metal Alkyls

profile_positions.description: Managing the sales activities for a specialized & strategic product portfolio within the German-speaking countries. Managing a team of office-based and externally operating sales representatives and sales managers. Managing key accounts within the German, Swiss and Austrian chemical and optical industries. Optimizing interaction with customers and other stakeholders. Ensuring compliance with quality and safety standards. Managing contacts with commercial representatives & distributors in the region.
profile_positions.title: Verkaufsleiter / Sales Manager Polymer Chemicals

profile_positions.description: Managing the sales activities for a strategic product portfolio within the Netherlands, Belgium, Central Europe, the Balkan region, Israel and South Africa. Managing key accounts within the polymer industries. Driving business development and technical service initiatives. Managing interaction with distributors and commercial agents within the region.
profile_positions.title: Area Sales Manager Polymer Chemicals

profile_positions.description: Managing the research and development for a specialty chemicals product line. Managing technical service activities within Europe, Middle East and Africa. Managing new product development in conjunction with major accounts in the plastics processing industries. Providing technical sales support. Managing research & development activities in a chemical laboratory including scale up and commercialization of new products. Supporting the commercial organization with insights in trends and developments in the plastics industries.
profile_positions.title: Technical Development Manager Polymer Additives

profile_positions.description: Providing technical service and commercial support for a specialty chemicals product line within the European region. Supporting new product introduction at large plastics processors and compounders within the European region.
